name: norseman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the people who lived in Scandinavia in the past, especially the Vikings: He had the roughness and strength of a Norseman. Experts say the inscription was written by visiting Norsemen in 1362. See
Norse
More examplesFewer examplesSome said the sport came from the Norsemen.The longhouse was built in the 17th century in a style originated by the Norsemen.Norsemen arrived here in the ninth century.
